title: U.S. Fed's Miran Says Policy Needs to Adjust to Stablecoin Boom That Could Reach $3T

title: Privacy Coin Zcash Continues Historic Surge, Nearing 8-Year High Price

title: OpenAI Sought Government Loan Guarantees Days Before Sam Altman's Denial

title: 'Final Fantasy' Maker Square Enix Confirms Layoffs as AI Takes Over Game Development

title: DraftKings CEO says Polymarket-style prediction markets may open more US states to sports betting
